profile.name: Elvis T. Harmon
profile.bio: I am a passionate AI developer with expertise in machine learning and full-stack development, dedicated to building innovative solutions. My work focuses on leveraging AI to solve real-world problems, with a strong interest in quantum computing applications in healthcare. I thrive on exploring cutting-edge technologies to enhance medical decision-making and optimize healthcare systems..
